001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
008import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.NavigableMap;
012import java.util.Objects;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import java.util.TreeMap;
015
016/**
017 * Flow assembler that buffers TCP segments per direction and emits in-order byte streams.
018 * <p>Synchronized to support concurrent ingestion per flow; buffering size depends on out-of-order
019 * data retained until gaps close.
020 *
021 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
022 */
023public final class ReorderingFlowAssembler implements FlowAssembler {
024  private final MetricsPort metrics;
025  private final String metricsPrefix;
026  private final Map<DirectionKey, DirectionState> flows = new HashMap<>();
027
028  /**
029   * Creates a reordering assembler.
030   *
031   * @param metrics metrics sink for assembler statistics
032   * @param metricsPrefix prefix used for metric keys; defaults to {@code "flowAssembler"}
033   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code metrics} is {@code null}
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */
036  public ReorderingFlowAssembler(MetricsPort metrics, String metricsPrefix) {
037    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
038    this.metricsPrefix = (metricsPrefix == null || metricsPrefix.isBlank())
039        ? "flowAssembler"
040        : metricsPrefix;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Accepts a TCP segment, buffering as needed until contiguous bytes become available.
045   *
046   * @param segment segment to assemble; may be {@code null}
047   * @return byte stream slice when contiguous bytes are ready; otherwise empty
048   * @implNote Maintains per-direction buffers and trims duplicates to honour TCP semantics.
049   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
050   */
051  @Override
052  public synchronized Optional<ByteStream> accept(TcpSegment segment) {
053    if (segment == null) {
054      metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".nullSegment");
055      return Optional.empty();
056    }
057
058    DirectionKey key = new DirectionKey(segment.flow(), segment.fromClient());
059    DirectionState state =
060        flows.computeIfAbsent(
061            key,
062            k -> new DirectionState(metrics, metricsPrefix, segment.fromClient()));
063
064    Optional<DirectionState.EmittedSlice> emitted = state.onSegment(segment);
065
066    if (segment.fin() || segment.rst()) {
067      state.markFinished();
068    }
069    if (state.shouldRetire()) {
070      state.close();
071      flows.remove(key);
072    }
073
074    return emitted.map(slice -> new ByteStream(
075        segment.flow(),
076        segment.fromClient(),
077        slice.data(),
078        slice.timestampMicros()));
079  }
080
081  private record DirectionKey(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {}
082
083  private static final class DirectionState {
084    private final MetricsPort metrics;
085    private final String metricsPrefix;
086    private final NavigableMap<Long, Chunk> buffer = new TreeMap<>();
087
088    private long nextExpected = Long.MIN_VALUE;
089    private boolean finished;
090
091    DirectionState(MetricsPort metrics, String metricsPrefix, boolean fromClient) {
092      this.metrics = metrics;
093      this.metricsPrefix = metricsPrefix + (fromClient ? ".client" : ".server");
094    }
095
096    Optional<EmittedSlice> onSegment(TcpSegment segment) {
097      byte[] payload = segment.payload();
098      if (payload.length > 0) {
099        long seq = normalize(segment.sequenceNumber());
100        store(seq, payload, segment.timestampMicros());
101      }
102
103      Optional<EmittedSlice> emitted = emitIfReady();
104      if (emitted.isPresent()) {
105        metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".contiguous");
106        metrics.observe(metricsPrefix + ".bytes", emitted.get().data().length);
107      } else if (payload.length > 0) {
108        metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".buffered");
109      }
110      return emitted;
111    }
112
113    private void store(long sequenceNumber, byte[] payload, long timestampMicros) {
114      long start = sequenceNumber;
115      if (nextExpected != Long.MIN_VALUE && start + payload.length <= nextExpected) {
116        metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".duplicate");
117        return;
118      }
119      if (nextExpected != Long.MIN_VALUE && start < nextExpected) {
120        int skip = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, nextExpected - start);
121        if (skip >= payload.length) {
122          metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".duplicate");
123          return;
124        }
125        byte[] trimmed = new byte[payload.length - skip];
126        System.arraycopy(payload, skip, trimmed, 0, trimmed.length);
127        payload = trimmed;
128        start = nextExpected;
129      }
130
131      Map.Entry<Long, Chunk> floor = buffer.floorEntry(start);
132      if (floor != null) {
133        long floorEnd = floor.getKey() + floor.getValue().data().length;
134        if (floorEnd > start) {
135          int overlap = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, floorEnd - start);
136          if (overlap >= payload.length) {
137            metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".duplicate");
138            return;
139          }
140          byte[] trimmed = new byte[payload.length - overlap];
141          System.arraycopy(payload, overlap, trimmed, 0, trimmed.length);
142          payload = trimmed;
143          start += overlap;
144        }
145      }
146
147      long end = start + payload.length;
148      Map.Entry<Long, Chunk> overlapping = buffer.ceilingEntry(start);
149      while (overlapping != null && overlapping.getKey() < end) {
150        long existingStart = overlapping.getKey();
151        Chunk existing = overlapping.getValue();
152        long existingEnd = existingStart + existing.data().length;
153        buffer.remove(existingStart);
154        if (existingEnd > end) {
155          int tailLen = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, existingEnd - end);
156          byte[] tail = new byte[tailLen];
157          System.arraycopy(existing.data(), existing.data().length - tailLen, tail, 0, tailLen);
158          buffer.put(end, new Chunk(tail, existing.timestampMicros()));
159        }
160        overlapping = buffer.ceilingEntry(start);
161      }
162
163      buffer.put(start, new Chunk(payload.clone(), timestampMicros));
164      metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".stored");
165    }
166
167    private Optional<EmittedSlice> emitIfReady() {
168      if (buffer.isEmpty()) {
169        return Optional.empty();
170      }
171      long expected = nextExpected;
172      if (expected == Long.MIN_VALUE) {
173        expected = buffer.firstKey();
174      }
175
176      if (buffer.firstKey() > expected) {
177        nextExpected = expected;
178        return Optional.empty();
179      }
180
181      ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
182      long cursor = expected;
183      long lastTimestamp = 0L;
184
185      while (!buffer.isEmpty()) {
186        Map.Entry<Long, Chunk> entry = buffer.firstEntry();
187        long start = entry.getKey();
188        if (start > cursor) {
189          break;
190        }
191        Chunk chunk = entry.getValue();
192        buffer.pollFirstEntry();
193        byte[] data = chunk.data();
194        if (start < cursor) {
195          int skip = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, cursor - start);
196          if (skip >= data.length) {
197            continue;
198          }
199          byte[] trimmed = new byte[data.length - skip];
200          System.arraycopy(data, skip, trimmed, 0, trimmed.length);
201          data = trimmed;
202          start = cursor;
203        }
204        out.write(data, 0, data.length);
205        cursor = start + data.length;
206        lastTimestamp = chunk.timestampMicros();
207      }
208
209      if (out.size() == 0) {
210        nextExpected = cursor;
211        return Optional.empty();
212      }
213
214      nextExpected = cursor;
215      return Optional.of(new EmittedSlice(out.toByteArray(), lastTimestamp));
216    }
217
218    void markFinished() {
219      finished = true;
220    }
221
222    boolean shouldRetire() {
223      return finished && buffer.isEmpty();
224    }
225
226    void close() {
227      buffer.clear();
228    }
229
230    private long normalize(long sequenceNumber) {
231      return sequenceNumber & 0xFFFFFFFFL;
232    }
233
234    private record Chunk(byte[] data, long timestampMicros) {
235      Chunk {
236        data = data != null ? data.clone() : new byte[0];
237      }
238    }
239
240    record EmittedSlice(byte[] data, long timestampMicros) {
241      EmittedSlice {
242        data = data != null ? data.clone() : new byte[0];
243      }
244    }
245  }
246}
247
